mapper.insert: insert into T_VIDEO_MEDIATE (MEDIATEID, MEDIATE_NAME, MEDIATE_PID, MEDIATE_ADDRESS, MEDIATE_PID_NUMBER, MEDIATE_TELEPHONE, MEDIATE_CELLPHONE, MEDIATE_COMPLETE_ADD, MEDIATE_IDENTIFIER, MEDIATE_REGIS_UNIT, MEDIATE_PURPOSE, MEDIATE_DATE, MEDIATE_REGIS_NAME, MEDIATE_REGIS_BRANCH, MEDIATE_REGIS_DATE, MEDIATE_NUMBER, MEDIATE_REASON, MEDIATE_CONTENT, MEDIATE_PROTOCOL, MEDIATER_STATUS, MEDIATE_CODE,CONF_ID ) values (#{mediateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediatePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediatePidNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateCompleteAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateRegisUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediatePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateRegisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateRegisBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateRegisDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediateProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaterStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mediateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update T_VIDEO_MEDIATE
MEDIATEID = #{record.mediateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_NAME = #{record.mediateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_PID = #{record.mediatePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_ADDRESS = #{record.mediateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_PID_NUMBER = #{record.mediatePidNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_TELEPHONE = #{record.mediateTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_CELLPHONE = #{record.mediateCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_COMPLETE_ADD = #{record.mediateCompleteAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_IDENTIFIER = #{record.mediateIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REGIS_UNIT = #{record.mediateRegisUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_PURPOSE = #{record.mediatePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_DATE = #{record.mediateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REGIS_NAME = #{record.mediateRegisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REGIS_BRANCH = #{record.mediateRegisBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REGIS_DATE = #{record.mediateRegisDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_NUMBER = #{record.mediateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REASON = #{record.mediateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_CONTENT = #{record.mediateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_PROTOCOL = #{record.mediateProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATER_STATUS = #{record.mediaterStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEDIATE_CODE = #{record.mediateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONF_ID = #{record.confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_VIDEO_MEDIATE set MEDIATEID = #{record.mediateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_NAME = #{record.mediateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_PID = #{record.mediatePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_ADDRESS = #{record.mediateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_PID_NUMBER = #{record.mediatePidNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_TELEPHONE = #{record.mediateTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_CELLPHONE = #{record.mediateCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_COMPLETE_ADD = #{record.mediateCompleteAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_IDENTIFIER = #{record.mediateIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REGIS_UNIT = #{record.mediateRegisUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_PURPOSE = #{record.mediatePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_DATE = #{record.mediateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REGIS_NAME = #{record.mediateRegisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REGIS_BRANCH = #{record.mediateRegisBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REGIS_DATE = #{record.mediateRegisDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_NUMBER = #{record.mediateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REASON = #{record.mediateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_CONTENT = #{record.mediateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_PROTOCOL = #{record.mediateProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATER_STATUS = #{record.mediaterStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEDIATE_CODE = #{record.mediateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONF_ID = #{record.confID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_VIDEO_MEDIATE
MEDIATE_NAME = #{mediateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_PID = #{mediatePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_ADDRESS = #{mediateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_PID_NUMBER = #{mediatePidNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_TELEPHONE = #{mediateTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_CELLPHONE = #{mediateCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_COMPLETE_ADD = #{mediateCompleteAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_IDENTIFIER = #{mediateIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REGIS_UNIT = #{mediateRegisUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_PURPOSE = #{mediatePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_DATE = #{mediateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REGIS_NAME = #{mediateRegisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REGIS_BRANCH = #{mediateRegisBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REGIS_DATE = #{mediateRegisDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_NUMBER = #{mediateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_REASON = #{mediateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_CONTENT = #{mediateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATE_PROTOCOL = #{mediateProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEDIATER_STATUS = #{mediaterStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEDIATE_CODE = #{mediateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONF_ID = #{confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MEDIATEID = #{mediateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_VIDEO_MEDIATE set MEDIATE_NAME = #{mediateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_PID = #{mediatePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_ADDRESS = #{mediateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_PID_NUMBER = #{mediatePidNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_TELEPHONE = #{mediateTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_CELLPHONE = #{mediateCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_COMPLETE_ADD = #{mediateCompleteAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_IDENTIFIER = #{mediateIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REGIS_UNIT = #{mediateRegisUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_PURPOSE = #{mediatePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_DATE = #{mediateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REGIS_NAME = #{mediateRegisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REGIS_BRANCH = #{mediateRegisBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REGIS_DATE = #{mediateRegisDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_NUMBER = #{mediateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_REASON = #{mediateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_CONTENT = #{mediateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATE_PROTOCOL = #{mediateProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDIATER_STATUS = #{mediaterStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEDIATE_CODE = #{mediateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONF_ID = #{confID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MEDIATEID = #{mediateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert all
into T_VIDEO_MEDIATE (MEDIATEID, MEDIATE_NAME, MEDIATE_PID, MEDIATE_ADDRESS, MEDIATE_PID_NUMBER, MEDIATE_TELEPHONE, MEDIATE_CELLPHONE, MEDIATE_COMPLETE_ADD, MEDIATE_IDENTIFIER, MEDIATE_REGIS_UNIT, MEDIATE_PURPOSE, MEDIATE_DATE, MEDIATE_REGIS_NAME, MEDIATE_REGIS_BRANCH, MEDIATE_REGIS_DATE, MEDIATE_REASON, MEDIATE_CONTENT, MEDIATE_PROTOCOL, MEDIATER_STATUS, MEDIATE_CODE, MEDIATE_NUMBER,CONF_ID ) values (#{item.mediateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediatePid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediatePidNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateCompleteAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateRegisUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediatePurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateRegisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateRegisBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateRegisDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediaterStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.mediateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediateNumber,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.confId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
select 1 from DUAL
mapper.select:
select fail,success,middle,duration,code,name from (select sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=0 then 1 else 0 end) as fail,sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=1 then 1 else 0 end) as success,sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=2 then 1 else 0 end) as middle,sum(c.duration) as duration,SUBSTR(t.MEDIATE_ADDRESS,0,3) as MEDIATE_ADDRESS from T_VIDEO_MEDIATE t,T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE c where c.conf_id=t.conf_id and MEDIATE_DATE BETWEEN #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{stop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by SUBSTR(t.MEDIATE_ADDRESS,0,3) )mediate
right JOIN area a on mediate.MEDIATE_ADDRESS=a.CODE where a.parent_id=0

select fail,success,middle,duration,code,name from (select sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=0 then 1 else 0 end) as fail,sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=1 then 1 else 0 end) as success,sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=2 then 1 else 0 end) as middle,sum(c.duration) as duration,SUBSTR(t.MEDIATE_ADDRESS,0,6) as MEDIATE_ADDRESS from T_VIDEO_MEDIATE t,T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE c where c.conf_id=t.conf_id and MEDIATE_DATE BETWEEN #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{stop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by SUBSTR(t.MEDIATE_ADDRESS,0,6) )mediate
right JOIN area a on mediate.MEDIATE_ADDRESS=a.CODE where a.ALEVEL='1' and a.code like '${area}%'

select a.name "areas.name",t.conf_id, a.code "areas.code", c.access_code "conference.accessCode", c.begin_time "conference.beginTime", c.duration "conference.duration", c.status "conference.status",
distinct
from T_VIDEO_MEDIATE t join area a on a.code=t.MEDIATE_ADDRESS left join T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE c on t.conf_id=c.conf_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select fail,success,middle,duration,current_month from (select sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=0 then 1 else 0 end) as fail, sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=1 then 1 else 0 end) as success, sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=2 then 1 else 0 end) as middle,sum(c.duration) as duration,T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH as oldMonth from T_VIDEO_MEDIATE t INNER JOIN T_VIDEO_CONFERENCE c on c.conf_id=t.conf_id RIGHT JOIN T_TIME ON T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH=TO_CHAR(t.MEDIATE_DATE / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) + TO_DATE('1970-01-01 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), 'MM') where t.MEDIATE_ADDRESS like '${code}%' and t.MEDIATE_DATE BETWEEN #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{stop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH)mediate RIGHT JOIN T_TIME on T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH=mediate.oldMonth order BY T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH asc
select count(1) from T_VIDEO_MEDIATE where MEDIATE_CODE=#{code}

select fail,success,middle,type,name from (select sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=0 then 1 else 0 end) as fail,sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=1 then 1 else 0 end) as success,sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=2 then 1 else 0 end) as middle,MEDIATE_PROTOCOL as dispute from T_VIDEO_MEDIATE t where TO_CHAR(t.MEDIATE_DATE / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) + TO_DATE('1970-01-01 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), 'YYYY')=#{year} group by t.MEDIATE_PROTOCOL )mediate right JOIN t_mediate_dispute a on mediate.dispute=a.type ORDER BY a.TYPE asc

select fail,success,middle,current_month from (select sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=0 then 1 else 0 end) as fail,sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=1 then 1 else 0 end) as success,sum(CASE when MEDIATER_STATUS=2 then 1 else 0 end) as middle,T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH as oldMonth from T_VIDEO_MEDIATE t RIGHT JOIN T_TIME ON T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH=TO_CHAR(t.MEDIATE_DATE / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) + TO_DATE('1970-01-01 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), 'MM') where t.mediate_protocol=#{type} and TO_CHAR(t.MEDIATE_DATE / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) + TO_DATE('1970-01-01 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS'), 'YYYY')=#{year} GROUP BY T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH )mediate RIGHT JOIN T_TIME on T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH=mediate.oldMonth order BY T_TIME.CURRENT_MONTH asc

select * from area where code in
#{code}
